string-array.name: dbcreate
string-array.item: create table if not exists User( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Name varchar(20) not null, AES varchar(256), RSAPrivate varchar(256), RSAPublic varchar(256) )

create table if not exists Devices( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Address varchar(17) not null, DeviceName varchar(20), FriendlyName varchar(20), Paired integer not null, LastSeen integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

create table if not exists Friends( ID integer primary key autoincrement, UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )

create table if not exists Send( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Text varchar(1024) not null, Timestamp integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )

create table if not exists Received( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Text varchar(1024) not null, Timestamp integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
create table if not exists AES( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Key varchar(256), DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
create table if not exists RSA( ID integer primary key autoincrement, Key varchar(256), DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
